_sText:
MADE BY: Xtra-Hoot (panic! at T spawn)

ROOMTACTIK_TEXTURE_B2 is a deathmatch map with multiple routes.  From the spawn players can either go towards the choke point which has been engineered so players cannot be shot coming out of spawn and to engage in combat have to move round the corner  to the enemy, they may also climb the walls of the spawn to  the middle platform which has ladders to another area below which then leads to the map floor.  Taking the other path from spawns, players reach the path at the back where the blocks make it difficult knowing where your enemy is.

NEW:  

Converted map to Texture from bricks
Added middle section
Added ladders in Spawns
Balanced sizes of walkways
Added ladders to lower platform and bottom

TO COME:
Secret room (:O)
Upper walkways
